article: hong kong 's community investment and inclusion fund -lrb- unk -rrb- will offer support to community projects , in an effort to sustain the momentum and nurture the community efforts generated by the anti-sars operation unite initiated over last weekend , said raymond wu unk , chairman of the unk committee tuesday .
